1970 patan lingika adhyapanaya jarmaniye pasal wishaya nirdeshaye kotasak wa pawathi. 1992 sita eya rajya wagakimak bawata naithika wa pathkara thibe. [33]podu washayen gathwita ee thula parinathawime kriyawaliya, yauwanodaye sharirika wenaswim, sanwedanayan, prajanaka kriyawaliya sambandha jiwawidyathmaka karunu, pemsabandatha pawathwima, samalingikathwaya, anawashya gabganim saha gabsawa, lingika prachandathwaye anathurudayaka bawa, lama apayojanaya, saha lingika wa sampreishanaya wana roga wani sama anshayak ma aawaranaya kere.
